oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Implosion-time for converging cylindrical and spherical shells
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SRINIVASAN, GK
SHARMA, VD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wtc expansions
equations
wave
imploding shells
self-similar solutions
time of implosion
wtc expansions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We examine the uniformly imploding pellets or shells, which are driven to implode by the action of compressional forces. Besides providing the precise time of implosion we discuss continuation of the solution beyond the time of implosion using WTC expansions. Our quantitative analysis confirms the observations of D. L. Book and I. B. Bernstein (1980).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: ZEITSCHRIFT FUR ANGEWANDTE MATHEMATIK UND PHYSIK, 55(6), 974-982
